title: 20 min priority queue for leaving for 3 minutes??!!
body: This is disgusting the game was about 15 mins in and a whole lot of nothing was happening it was going to be a long ass game and i had leave to go to my other house that is just up the road (Really long story) and i got there finished the game and when i went to the menu it told me i now have to wait 20 minutes before playing a game because i abandoned the last one, i left for literally 3 minuets... Wtf? I've spend probably a good thousand dollars on the game and this is what i get i don't even know if i want to keep playing

replies.body: Riot does not care about how much money you spent on the game. You broke one of their rules and paid the price for it. LeaverBuster bans only activate if you have a history of leaving games so I doubt this was your first time...
